entries.headline: Phase 0: Diabolical Creation
entries.content:
I have engineered a particularly interesting organism that I am calling the squirg. Drawn to the specific frequencies of sentient brain matter, the creature attaches to the victimâ€™s skull in order to nourish itself with cerebral energy.

The result? The victim is immediately incapacitated, becoming a slave to the squirg as it slowly drains their remaining consciousness.
Truly diabolical.

I consider it one of my greatest works.
